Content.Text:
<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, what a coincidence! Hello, <MYNAME>.
Were you feeling hungry too?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
I see. Well then, would you care to join me?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hee hee. How wonderful. Come on, let's have a
seat.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The food here is delicious. I especially like the
<ITEMNAME0>.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well, we can't let it get cold. Let's dig in.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
...

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
No, no. It's nothing.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Excuse me. Raeger?

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yes? What can I do for you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>This dish tastes a little different from last time.
Have you changed the recipe at all?
<PAGE>
<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>The <ITEMNAME0>? Oh, yeah, that
probably does taste different from the last time
you had it.
<PAGE>
I'm doing...kind of a trial run today. Thought I'd
shake up the menu a bit, make a few
adjustments here and there.
<PAGE>
That's one of my jazzed-up attempts. I tried
adding clams for a little more savory flavor.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Not a fan?
<PAGE>
<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Oh, well, it's quite delicious. But I think I prefer
the original recipe just a little more.

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, hmm. Sorry about that. I'll see what I can do
to make it better for you next time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Would you? How thoughtful! Thanks. I'm sorry I
interrupted you just to complain. You must be
so busy.
<PAGE>
<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>No, it's okay. Constructive critiques help me
make this place better, so thanks!

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...
Don't like clams?
You have discerning taste.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>H-how could you tell?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
And here I thought I did a good job of hiding it,
too. You're quite observant.
<PAGE>
But it's times like this when it's more polite to
pretend not to notice, even if it means you have
to tell a little white lie.
<PAGE>
All the effort I put into glossing over it is making
me feel all the more embarrassed now.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>Hee hee! No, it's all right. I like how refreshingly
honest you are.
<PAGE>
That also goes to show how well you pay
attention to me, which is flattering, to say the
least.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT><FACE_NORMAL>Though I would appreciate it if we could keep
this as our secret. No one else needs to know.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>What would I do if you told? Hee hee, what
would I do indeed...?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I think I'll wait until you've let the cat out of the
bag before I decide how to punish you.
<PAGE>
But for now...

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>Would you please help me eat all these clams?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm? O-oh. R-right. I guess you could say that,
yes.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
No, no. It's nothing.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>By the way...I've gotten very full. I'm not sure I
could eat another bite.
<PAGE>
Would you like to try what's left of my dish?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>Oh... Th-that's unfortunate. It would be a pity
not to finish it all. I guess I'll try to eat the rest...
<PAGE>
I'll try...very hard...ick.
